Description: Necklace: consisting of fourteen biconical glass crumb beads interspersed with groups of three white shell cylinder disc beads and green, blue and black globular glazed composition beads.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: The excavations at Hiw of First Intermediate Period graves are described in W. M. F. Petrie, ‘Diospolis Parva: the Cemeteries of Abadiyeh and Hu. 1898-9’ (London, 1901), 37-41.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (288)
